categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: This shuttle was a craft used by the Rebel Alliance for diplomatic missions.

Around 4 ABY,[source?] Luke Skywalker used this shuttle to travel to the planet Solay. After fighting in the Battle of Solay, an Imperial fleet moved in and blockaded the planet, suppressing all rebel activity. However, Skywalker was able to bypass the blockade, outflying the rebel ships to escape Solay. Skywalker brought along the local infochant Braxas with him in exchange for information about the conclusion of the earlier battle.
